conversations.body_text: Hi Peterson Batista Rodrigues,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Please take a photo of the received goods and send it to me. I will verify the details with our warehouse staff.

Here is no screws just the 2 metal plate with no screws

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Any update on the below?

Also I am having problems with the module as it is showing driver error when I connect to usb, I already tried everything to solve the issues, like install again Simpson management, change usb port and still same message

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hello any update on a solution for my issue, module box is not working at all I need assistance asap please it says driver error

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Peterson Batista Rodrigues,    I apologize for the delayed response. Here is your shipping tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047059288371  I will have our support team assist you with the issue you encountered.

I had no reply in this issue and I am with my equipment with no use because I could not find a solution

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi

no one has replied to help me with this issue, to don't delay even more i had to purchase a new module to save time, i will need to get this credited

hopefully with the new module it will works
________________________________
De: service@simsonn.com

Hi Peterson Batista Rodrigues,   Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button. While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”. In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update. In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu. Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application. Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.   Note: Make sure to use the USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC and avoid USB hubs to ensure stable power and proper device recognition.

I tried to do it however showed the same message that driver error and do not recognise on simsonn manager even with the latest version

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hello any update on the below? As the instructions you sent has not worked and is being so long since the product arrived and I can not use it

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Peterson Batista Rodrigues,       Are you available within the next 8–12 hours? Please install the ToDesk tool so I can remotely check the issue for you.

I prefer using helpdesk if possible

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Peterson Batista Rodrigues,  Alright, please press the upgrade button on the main controller and reconnect the USB cable. Check whether SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 prompts that it has entered SIMSONN Flasher mode. If it does, you can manually update the firmware in the software settings. Please record the full process of entering the mode and updating the firmware, send the video to us via Google Drive, and set the viewing permissions so I can verify.
